product_name: KIALOA Insanity Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: Crazy light and crazy strong, the KIALOA Insanity Adjustable Stand Up Paddle features 16 in. of adjustability so you can share it with others, and it weighs just under 2 pounds. KIALOA Insanity Travel Adjustable Stand Up Paddle adjusts from 70 - 86 in. for multiple paddling applications and different size paddlers. Innovative LeverLock(R) handle makes it really easy to adjust the length of the paddle on the fly. To adjust length, simply open the lever on the handle, adjust the length to the hash marks on the shaft that corresponds to your height, and paddle away. Lightweight fiberglass shaft offers flex on every stroke and high durability, and fiberglass blade offers excellent durability. Comfortable grip fits right into the palm of your hand.
short_description: Crazy light and crazy strong, the KIALOA Insanity Adjustable Stand Up Paddle features 16 in. of adjustability so you can share it with others, and it weighs just under 2 pounds.
